item.title: Business Process Modelling - Simulation Workshop Assignment
item.description: BSYS601: Business Process Management - Simulation Workshop Assignment - A+ level (100%) Below is the Simulation Workshop Assignment doc for the BSYS601 paper. If the preview does not work, click the link here. Below is the Simulation Workshop Claim handling process diagram. If the preview does not work, click the link here. Below is the Simulation output from Signavio. If the preview does not work, click the link here. Case Study An insurance company, AAA, believes that they should take a careful look at the performance of their claim-to-resolution process.
